settings.heading: Anti-Strip Back-Zip Jumpsuit

settings.caption: Clothing for Alzheimer’s and Dementia Care

settings.text:
Our dementia clothing is thoughtfully designed to meet the unique needs of those living with Alzheimer’s, dementia, or other cognitive challenges. This anti-strip back-zip jumpsuit helps prevent unwanted disrobing while ensuring your loved one stays cozy, secure, and at ease — day and night.

Whether for use in memory care, nursing homes, or home caregiving, this Alzheimer’s onesie brings together functionality, comfort, and dignity in one easy-to-wear piece.

settings.heading: What Caregivers Are Saying

settings.text: Real stories from families who found peace of mind with this onesie.

settings.text: "My mother used to undress herself daily at any moment. I thought, what do I have to lose? Now she can’t undress, and I no longer have to chase her or struggle to dress her. That was 80% of my day."

settings.heading: Anti Strip Back-zip

settings.text: The back-to-front zipper is gently designed to help protect your loved one from unwanted disrobing, accidents, or exposure — common challenges for those living with dementia or Alzheimer’s. It zips from the upper back to the front, making it difficult for the wearer to remove, but easy for caregivers to manage dressing and changes with care and dignity. This thoughtful feature helps keep your loved one safe, secure, and comfortable, giving you both a little more peace of mind.

settings.heading: Makes diaper changes faster and cleaner

settings.text: The generous fit and smart design make it simple to change adult diapers without fully undressing your loved one. This helps prevent unnecessary messes and makes cleanup more efficient — especially during nighttime changes. By keeping the outfit secure and in place, it also reduces the chances of incontinence leaks caused by disrobing, offering more comfort for the wearer and less stress for the caregiver.

settings.heading: Why Loved Ones Love This Onesie

settings.text:
While caregivers appreciate the practicality, comfort matters most to the person wearing it.

  • Soft, cozy feel all day and night — made with 95% premium cotton to avoid sensory discomfort
  • Warm and gentle on the skin — ideal for cooler months or chilly nights
  • No irritating fasteners or tags in contact with skin
  • Designed for restful sleep and less nighttime agitation
  • Feels like regular clothing, not medical wear — preserving dignity and routine

This isn’t just functional clothing — it’s a way to help your loved one feel safe, calm, and cared for.

settings.heading: How to Wear Our Anti-Strip Jumpsuit

settings.text: Our dementia-friendly jumpsuits are thoughtfully designed with generous sizing to comfortably accommodate adult diapers or incontinence products. Ideal for individuals living with Alzheimer’s, dementia, or other cognitive challenges, these jumpsuits feature a roomy fit to provide comfort throughout the day and night. Please note that our sizing tends to run larger than traditional clothing to ensure plenty of space and ease of movement. To achieve the perfect fit, we recommend reviewing our sizing chart carefully, or choosing one size smaller if you prefer a slightly snugger fit. Find the ideal size to keep your loved one cozy, secure, and comfortable.

settings.heading: Is this jumpsuit suitable for nighttime wear?
settings.row_content: Yes! The warm, breathable material makes it ideal for overnight use, especially for those who remove their clothing during the night.

settings.heading: Can someone remove it themselves?
settings.row_content: Not easily. The back-zipper is placed to be out of reach, making this a perfect anti-strip solution for dementia patients.

settings.heading: Is it comfortable for sensitive skin?
settings.row_content: Absolutely. This jumpsuit is made with 95% premium cotton, designed to be soft, breathable, and cozy — even for individuals who are sensitive to texture or prone to agitation.

settings.heading: What sizes do you offer?
settings.row_content: We offer a range of sizes. Please refer to the sizing chart above or contact us with any questions.

settings.heading: Is this suitable for both men and women?
settings.row_content: Yes, this is a unisex design and fits both men and women comfortably.

settings.heading: Does it restrict movement or comfort?
settings.row_content: Not at all. The fabric is soft and stretchy, allowing full range of motion while still maintaining a secure fit.

settings.heading: Can it be machine washed and dried?
settings.row_content: Yes, this jumpsuit is machine washable and dryer-safe. For best results, wash in cold water and tumble dry on low.

settings.heading: Is the zipper hidden or padded to prevent discomfort?
settings.row_content: Yes, the back zipper is covered with a soft flap to protect skin and prevent irritation or pressure points while lying down or sitting.

settings.heading: Does it help prevent diaper digging or smearing?
settings.row_content: Yes, the one-piece design covers the diaper area securely, making it difficult for the wearer to tamper with incontinence products or create messes.

settings.heading: Is this suitable for use in nursing homes or care facilities?
settings.row_content: Absolutely. Many care facilities, assisted living centers, and memory care units use this jumpsuit to support resident safety, hygiene, and dignity.

settings.heading: Do you offer discounts for bulk or facility orders?
settings.row_content: Yes — please contact us directly for pricing on bulk orders, care facility needs, or recurring shipments.

Can't afford our product?

settings.text:
At Dementia Aide, we are deeply committed to ensuring that everyone has access to the support they need, regardless of their financial situation. We understand that some individuals and families may face financial challenges, and we believe that financial constraints should never be a barrier to receiving essential care products. If you or a loved one is in need of our products but cannot afford them, please do not hesitate to reach out to us.

We invite you to email us at info@dementiaaide.com, and we will work together to find a solution.

Your well-being and peace of mind are our top priorities, and we are dedicated to supporting you in any way we can.
